analysis: The project currently lacks a cohesive black hole theme. The HTML file needs sections dedicated to black holes, the CSS file should incorporate cosmic animations and dark themes, and the JavaScript file should handle interactive elements related to black holes.

improvements.description: Add sections for black hole information, including interactive elements like animated slides and cosmic visuals.
Implement a dark, cosmic theme with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements.
Enhance JavaScript functionality to include event handlers for black hole-themed interactive elements and ensure smooth transitions.
